title: La Moncloa. 08/05/2019. Nadia Calviño to become chair of European Bank of Reconstruction and Development's board of governors [Government/News]
snippet: She replaces the Vice-President of the European Commission, Jyrki Katainen, in this rotating position. The board of governors is made up of representatives of the countries and institutions that form part of the EBRD, who combine this function ...

title: 'Europe's unity is our strength,' European Investment Bank chief Calviño tells Euronews
snippet: European Investment Bank President Nadia Calviño told Euronews' morning show Europe Today that the EU should stick together after the US administration claimed the bloc was weak and in decline.

title: Nadia Calviño named EIB chief – POLITICO
snippet: BRUSSELS – Spain's Finance Minister Nadia Calviño will become the next head of the European Investment Bank after EU countries agreed on Friday morning to her appointment.
